title: OnePlus 10 Pro is limited to 65W charging in the US, down from 80W in other regions
content:
Charging has always been a focus for OnePlus, with the brand usually having the fastest wired charging speeds of any smartphone sold in the US. This year, the OnePlus 10 Pro ups the ante with 80W charging, but that’s limited to 65W in the United States.

more…

The post OnePlus 10 Pro is limited to 65W charging in the US, down from 80W in other regions appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: OnePlus is limiting the charging speed on its new OnePlus 10 Pro in the United States to 65W, but for good reason.
